p: The four Vitex species we collected ( Vitex capitata, V. megapotamica, V. gardneriana and V. rufescens) were analyzed by repeat sequence primers via Inter-Simple Sequence Repeat (ISSR). The DNA was extracted from young, fresh leaves as previously described ( Doyle, 1991). Fourteen primers were used to screen for polymorphisms ( Table 1 ). The PCR amplification parameters and ISSR method used followed that as described in Sena Filho et al. (2010).
